name: devops
description: DevOps tooling and infrastructure used for deploying this monorepo

scripts.aks:srvthreds:deploy: npm run k8s -- aks deploy -p srvthreds
scripts.aks:srvthreds:status: npm run k8s -- aks status -p srvthreds
scripts.minikube:srvthreds:deploy:services: npm run k8s -- minikube deploy -p srvthreds
scripts.minikube:srvthreds:deploy:databases: npm run k8s -- minikube deploy -p srvthreds
scripts.minikube:srvthreds:deploy:all: npm run k8s -- minikube deploy -p srvthreds -d s_a_dbs_s
scripts.minikube:srvthreds:reset: npm run k8s -- minikube reset -p srvthreds
scripts.minikube:srvthreds:cleanup: npm run k8s -- minikube cleanup -p srvthreds
scripts.minikube:srvthreds:status: npm run k8s -- minikube status -p srvthreds
